title: American Business Awards (Stevie) - Best Emerging Technology - iCIMS CXM
description: iCIMS CXM won the 2024 Stevie Award for Best Emerging Technology. As Director of Engineering managing the CXM team, I led the development of this AI-powered candidate relationship management platform that evolved from the original Jibe CRM acquisition into an award-winning recruitment marketing solution.

title: Webby - People's Voice Award for Websites - Entertainment

This recognition honored the site's excellence in digital entertainment experience. As a Senior Front End Engineer, I contributed to the foundational site overhaul and architecture that enabled this award-winning user experience.
link_title: Marvel Nabs Three 2019 Webby Awards | News | Marvel
